product_name: Thule Fat Tire Kit for T2 Bike Rack
long_description: An upgrade kit for carrying fat bikes on a Thule T2 Bike Carrier (sold separately), the Thule Fat Tire Kit for T2 Bike Rack allows you to go big with your portly-wheeled new ride.
short_description: An upgrade kit for carrying fat bikes on a Thule T2 Bike Carrier (sold separately), the Thule Fat Tire Kit for T2 Bike Rack allows you to go big with your portly-wheeled new ride.
